sen.j: 京滋奈（けいじな）とは、京都府と滋賀県と奈良県を併せた地域のことである。
sen.e: Keijina is a term referring to the area combining Kyoto Prefecture, Shiga Prefecture, and Nara Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Keijina is a term referring to the area combining Kyoto Prefecture, Shiga Prefecture, and Nara Prefecture.
Keijina is a term referring to the area combining Kyoto Prefecture, Shiga Prefecture, and Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 若しくは、京都府船井郡以南と滋賀県湖南地方と奈良盆地を併せた地域のことを指す呼び名である。
sen.e: It also refers to the areas south of Funai-gun in Kyoto Prefecture, Konan region in Shiga Prefecture, and Nara Basin.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It also refers to the areas south of Funai-gun County in Kyoto Prefecture, Konan region in Shiga Prefecture, and Nara Basin.
It also refers to the areas south of Funai County in Kyoto Prefecture, Konan region in Shiga Prefecture, and Nara Basin.

tit.j: 京都と滋賀と奈良のつながり
tit.e: Connection among Kyoto, Shiga, and Nara
